title: Gigi Hadid posts glam behind-the-scenes shots of Donatella Versace's Milan Fashion Week afterparty
text:
Gigi Hadid gave the public a glimpse behind-the-scenes of Donatella Versace's wild Milan Fashion Week afterparty that included guests Jennifer Lopez, Kaia Gerber, Kendall Jenner, and Bella Hadid via her secret Instagram account @gisposables on Tuesday.

The supermodel used disposable film to capture some seriously glam shots of the stars partying it up.

Gigi, 24, posted shots including one of Jennifer, 50, and Donatella, 64, getting down to music.

Dance: Gigi Hadid gave the public a glimpse behind-the-scenes of Donatella Versace's wild Milan Fashion Week afterparty that included guests Jennifer Lopez, Kaia Gerber, Kendall Jenner, and Bella Hadid via her secret Instagram account on Tuesday

Jennifer wore her famous plunging green gown that she modeled on the catwalk during the week.

The shots also included a photo of Kendall, 23, and Bella, 23, sitting on a couch and flipping the bird to the camera with carefree expressions.

Another photo displayed Kaia, 18, serving a fierce gaze as she donned a baroque print two-piece set that flaunted her toned midriff.

Party time, excellent! The shots also included a photo of Kendall and Bella sitting on a couch and flipping the bird to the camera with carefree expressions

Vogue: Another photo displayed Kaia serving a fierce gaze as she donned a baroque print two-piece set that flaunted her toned midriff

Gigi had an eventful Milan Fashion Week herself, even leading a fleet of models alongside Kaia and Bella at the Max Mara Spring-Summer 2020 collection show.

Bella led the way in a slinky lilac slip paired with a matching hat and was followed by her sister and Cindy Crawford's lookalike daughter who wore near-identical ensembles in a variety of shades.

The trio lit up the catwalk in their matching ensembles, while they were also joined by Joan Smalls, who was sporting a similar dress to the ladies in black.

Strut: Gigi had an eventful Milan Fashion Week herself, even leading a fleet of models alongside Kaia and Bella at the Max Mara Spring-Summer 2020 collection show

Bella, Gigi and Kaia strutted alongside a host of other models including Joan Smalls, Candice Swanepoel and Doutzen Kroes who shone at the show.

Gigi's photos come after her public admission of a relationship with new boyfriend Tyler Cameron.

Tyler supported Gigi last week for the Rotterdam funeral of Gigi's Dutch maternal grandmother Ans Van Den Herik.
description: Gigi Hadid gave the public a glimpse behind-the-scenes of Donatella Versace's wild Milan Fashion Week afterparty that included guests Jennifer Lopez, Kaia Gerber, Kendall
